dict.string: A program running within Supacode would like to use AppleScript.
A program running within Supacode would like to use Bluetooth.
A program running within Supacode would like to access your Calendar.
A program running within Supacode would like to use the camera.
A program running within Supacode would like to access your Contacts.
A program running within Supacode would like to access the local network.
A program running within Supacode would like to access your location information.
A program running within Supacode would like to use your microphone.
A program running within Supacode would like to access motion data.
A program running within Supacode would like to access your Photo Library.
A program running within Supacode would like to access your reminders.
A program running within Supacode would like to use speech recognition.
A program running within Supacode requires elevated privileges.
